14 -def get_suite(): 

15      """Return TestSuite for all unit-test of PyTils""" 
16      suite = unittest.TestSuite() 
17      for module_name in __all__: 
18          imported_module = __import__("pytils.test."+module_name, 
19                                         globals(), 
20                                         locals(), 
21                                         ["pytils.test"]) 
22          loader = unittest.defaultTestLoader 
23          suite.addTest(loader.loadTestsFromModule(imported_module)) 
24   
25      return suite

27 -def run(verbosity=1): 

28      """Run all unit-test of PyTils""" 
29      suite = get_suite()
